name: green.
description:
green.

Green has you play as a small black square, making its way to a while portal while restricted by geometry, gravity, and many hazards.

Tap a direction while airborne to be propelled in that direction, which is called a dash. Green is easy to pick up and complete and features addictive and replayable gameplay.

Green boasts:

  • 60+ levels
  • Relaxing and addictive gameplay
  • Post-game content
  • Time trial mode
  • Stats menu
  • Replayability
  • Discord Rich Presence Support
  • Fully functional level editor
  • Boss fight???
